title: Sonic Automotive shares jump 3.3% after earnings top estimates
text: Sonic Automotive Inc. shares SAH, +3.81% rose 3.3% Thursday, after the car retailer posted third-quarter earnings that beat analyst estimates. Charlotte, North Carolina-based Sonic said it had net income of $29.0 million, or 66 cents a share, in the quarter, up from $15.1 million, or 35 cents a share, in the year-earlier period. Revenue rose 9.4% to $2.703 billion from $2.471 billion. The FactSet consensus was for EPS of 57 cents and revenue of $2.603 billion. The company, which operates more than 100 dealerships across 13 states and 25 metropolitan markets, said its EchoPark used-car unit sold 13,206 units in the quarter, up 71.6% from the third quarter of 2018. EchoPark generated revenue of $312.2 million, up 67.9%. Shares have gained 130% in 2019, while the S&P 500 SPX, +0.02% has gained 20%.
